comments:
Failed to re-open facesconfig editor after manage bean and navigation rules are added when performing smoke tests against JSF build for WTP 1.5RC2.  

The JSF build can be found in the followingURL.
http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/webtools/jsf/committers/drops/wtp-jsf-I-I200605070654-200605070654.zip

Created an attachment (id=40653)
log from workspace where re-open facesconfig editor failed.

The following is probably related to error but not sure how easy it is to reproduce.  

After the workspace shutdown due to a out of memory error, the error is seen once restart eclipse and to open facesconfig editor.

Palette related seems.  The followings is the error message and stack trace appear in the palette.

Message:
Unable to create this part due to an internal error. Reason for the failure: Index: 0, Size: 0

Please review this issue. This is a show-stopper for the RC2 build.
This bug has been fixed before RC2. Please verify it.
Fixed and checked in the CVS, it should be included in RC2.
